subsection.name: DPML SDK
subsection.p: A binary distribution of the DPML Component Management Platform SDK is required. It includes a project library and build automation tool, a resource management framework, a light-weight IOC container, and a server management system.

subsection.name: Java JDK @JAVA-PRODUCT-VERSION@ (or later)
subsection.p: Products and tutorials included under this site require the installation of Java @JAVA-PRODUCT-VERSION@ or later. General speaking this means you need to install the Java 1.5 (or 1.4) SDK.
